location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'File 6/1 Foreign Interests: American Mission at Muscat'

physicalDescription.extent: The papers are arranged in approximate chronological order from the front to the rear of the file.

Foliation: the foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 26; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: This file contains correspondence concerning the following:An application made for travel documents and permission to return to Muscat from India by Dr Sarah L Hosman of the American Mission and a nurse named May Edna BarterThe enforced closure of the American Medical Mission school by the Muscat authorities.The correspondence in the file is primarily between officials at the Political Agency in Muscat and the Political Residency in Bahrain.
